name: Fly Your Imagination
description:
There was a time where you could be whatever you wanted...

A time were everything was easy to imagine, to explore and discover...

Where does that time went?

Where did you stopped to dream, to believe?

Let's go back...

Let's fly our imagination one more time.

  • Lead Programmer: Adrián Rangel Suárez (The Developer)
  • Artist: Santiago Alberto Medina Ordáz (MendedMoss)
  • Programmer: Daniel Samael Gámez Garza (Sansamael)
  • Designer: Alfonso Andrés Morillo Uzcategui (Sigfrid the Blue)
